!FileTypes for FAR1/FAR2/x86/x64

===About===
Fast and easy editor of windows associations

===How to use?===
Install plugin first, then *F11 !FileTypes*, or use plugin prefix - type in command line:
{{{
ftypes:
}}}
or
{{{
ftypes:<extension>
}}}
and press Enter.
